suggestions.original: To improve the deformation dimension, consider enhancing the abstract qualities of the dog and yarn balls. Simplify and stylize these elements more, perhaps by using exaggerated shapes or unconventional colors. Additionally, ensure that the deformations are more cohesive with the overall composition, creating a more unified and harmonious scene. This could involve adjusting the proportions and perspectives of the house and bowl to better integrate with the playful, imaginative theme.
